comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on April 29, 2023, 12:56:37 AMLooks like this project was a scam or it folded.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449113.0Thanks, I changed 1 post.And it is not surprising that such a scam is happening in the present. If one of the miners decided to mine this coin, then they did not have many losses.This is a good lesson for beginners who are mining new coins. I mined coins for several months and hoped to sell at a high price, but then the project was closed. It's good that this project closed after a few days.
